Plot: An eccentric and dogmatic inventor sells his house and takes his family to Central America to build a utopia in the middle of the jungle. Conflicts with his family, a local preacher and ...
Title: The Mosquito Coast
Actors: Harrison Ford, Helen Mirren, River Phoenix, Conrad Roberts
tomatoConsensus: Harrison Ford capably tackles a tough, unlikable role, producing a fascinating and strange character study.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Golden Globes. Another 1 win & 1 nomination.
